methods.encodeArray:
Convert the given array to a String.

*Overload 1*  
  :param array: (double[]) - the array
  :return: (java.lang.String) array encoded as string
  
*Overload 2*  
  :param array: (long[]) - the array
  :return: (java.lang.String) array encoded as string
methods.getArray:
Create a properly typed array from the input string based upon the delimiter, given a supplier.

Note: Java generics information - <T>

:param value: (java.lang.String) - The array string value
:param strict: (boolean) - if strict processing should be used
:param elementSupplier: (java.util.function.Function<java.util.stream.Stream<java.lang.String>,T>) - a supplier to convert a stream of element strings to items of the correct types
:return: (T) an array of values of the specified type
methods.getDoubleArray:
Parse the given string as an array of doubles, based upon the delimiter.

:param value: (java.lang.String) - string to parse
:param strict: (boolean) - enforce format strictly
:return: (double[]) array of parsed values
methods.getLongArray:
Parse the given string as an array of longs, based upon the delimiter.

:param value: (java.lang.String) - string the to parse
:param strict: (boolean) - enforce format strictly
:return: (long[]) array of parsed values
methods.toStringArray:
Split the input string into an array of strings based on the delimiter.

:param value: (java.lang.String) - the array as a string
:param strict: (boolean) - if strict processing should be used
:return: (java.lang.String[]) an array of strings

text:
A simple wrapper for string-to-array parsing. Parsers are kept in a cache per-delimiter so that we avoid
 recompiling the pattern regex.
